articles.title: Pink-ball Test: Jhulan Goswami, Pooja Vastrakar shine as India women dominate Australia on Day 3 - India Today
articles.description: Pink-ball Test: India women finished Day 3 in a dominant position as pacers Jhulan Goswami and Pooja Vastrakar picked up 2 wickets each. Earlier, a hundred from Smriti Mandhana and a fifty from Deepti Sharma helped India post 377 for 8 declared.
